TypeSignature.Value: public delegate object ServiceCreatorCallback(IServiceContainer container, Type serviceType);
.class public auto ansi sealed ServiceCreatorCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ServiceCreatorCallback(container As IServiceContainer, serviceType As Type) As Object
public delegate System::Object ^ ServiceCreatorCallback(IServiceContainer ^ container, Type ^ serviceType);
type ServiceCreatorCallback = delegate of IServiceContainer * Type -> obj

Docs.param: The service container that requested the creation of the service.
The type of service to create.
Docs.summary: Provides a callback mechanism that can create an instance of a service on demand.
Docs.returns: The service specified by , or if the service could not be created.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback> provides a mechanism to publish services that you can request to have created when needed, rather than the service being created immediately when the designer loads. You can use a callback function if the service is not essential and may not be used. A service published by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback> does not use as many additional resources if it is not requested and created. To use a callback function to publish your service, pass a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceCreatorCallback> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.AddService%2A> method of an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.
## Examples The following code example shows how to publish a service using a callback function.
[!code-cpp[Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ServiceCreatorCallback Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
